steps.title: Initial Keypad Entry
steps.description: Enter the four-digit code on the keypad.

steps.title: Troubleshooting a Locked Screen
steps.description: If the screen locks up (numbers remain displayed or unresponsive), repeatedly press buttons on the keypad until the screen goes blank with a red blinking light. This resets the keypad.

steps.title: Keypad Entry After Reset
steps.description: Once the screen is blank and the red light is blinking, re-enter the four-digit code to access the system.
